worlds.description: Neon-lit dystopian future with corporate megastructures

chapters.story: You infiltrate the neon compound. Security drones patrol above, their red sensors scanning for intruders. Your augmented muscles must be tested.
chapters.challenge: Complete strength circuit to disable security grid
chapters.success_message: Grid disabled. You move deeper into the compound.

chapters.story: The server room lies ahead. You need speed and agility to navigate the laser grid without triggering alarms.
chapters.success_message: You slip through undetected. Data upload begins.

chapters.story: Alarms blare. Corporate enforcers approach. You need explosive power to escape through the ventilation shafts.
chapters.success_message: You emerge on the rooftop, mission complete.

worlds.description: Medieval fantasy realm with dragons, magic, and ancient ruins

chapters.story: The ancient forest whispers secrets. You must build the strength to lift the Stone of Awakening and begin your quest.
chapters.challenge: Strength training to lift the sacred stone
chapters.success_message: The stone glows. Your journey as the Chosen begins.

chapters.story: Goblins ambush your path to the Crystal Caves. You need endurance to outrun them through the winding trails.
chapters.challenge: Endurance run to escape the goblin horde
chapters.success_message: You reach the caves, breathless but alive.

chapters.story: The Dragon of Mount Ember awakens. To face it, you must master balance and core strength to wield the legendary sword.
chapters.challenge: Core training to master the blade
chapters.success_message: The dragon bows. You are now a legend.

worlds.description: Sci-fi space exploration with alien worlds and zero-gravity challenges

chapters.story: Your ship crash-lands on Planet Zephyr. Low gravity means you need controlled movements to explore without floating away.
chapters.challenge: Controlled movement training in low-G simulation
chapters.success_message: Navigation systems repaired. Onward to the next sector.

chapters.story: An alien structure pulses with energy. You must build power to break through its crystalline doors.
chapters.challenge: Explosive power to breach alien barriers
chapters.success_message: The doors shatter. Ancient technology awaits.

chapters.story: Hostile life forms detected. You sprint back to your ship across the hostile terrain, dodging plasma bursts.
chapters.success_message: You blast off. Mission successful, discoveries secured.

worlds.description: Survival in a harsh wasteland after civilization's collapse

chapters.story: The wasteland is unforgiving. You scavenge through ruins, needing strength to move debris and uncover supplies.
chapters.challenge: Strength work to clear rubble and survive
chapters.success_message: Supplies secured. You live another day.

chapters.story: Raiders spotted on the horizon. You must run to the safe zone before they reach you.
chapters.success_message: You reach the bunker, safe for now.

chapters.story: A mutant beast guards the water source. You need agility and power to defend yourself and claim what's yours.
chapters.challenge: Combat training to defeat the beast
chapters.success_message: The beast retreats. Clean water is yours.

chapters.story: Your powers are awakening. You feel energy coursing through you, but control requires discipline and strength.
chapters.challenge: Build foundational strength to control powers
chapters.success_message: You lift a car with one hand. Control is improving.

chapters.story: A villain attacks downtown. You need speed to reach civilians before disaster strikes.
chapters.challenge: Speed training to save the city
chapters.success_message: Civilians saved. The city calls you hero.

chapters.story: The final battle. Your nemesis has strength and skill. You need explosive power to match them.
chapters.challenge: Power training for the ultimate showdown
chapters.success_message: Victory is yours. You are now a true hero.

worlds.description: Training to become a legendary ninja master

chapters.story: The dojo master watches as you attempt the Wall of Shadows. Balance and core strength are essential.
chapters.challenge: Core training to master the wall
chapters.success_message: The master nods. You advance to the next trial.

chapters.story: An assassination mission requires stealth and explosive speed. You have one chance to strike.
chapters.challenge: Explosive power for the perfect strike

chapters.story: The final test: navigate the obstacle course faster than any ninja before you.
chapters.success_message: You are now a master ninja. Your name is legend.
